entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 30 early in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
